import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' import {useSpring, useChain, animated} from 'react-spring' import * as easings from 'd3-ease' import Web from '../assets/images/Backgrounds/ErsinMandalievRGB.jpg' import Mobile from '../assets/images/Backgrounds/EfeKurnazHallway.jpg' import ProfileCarousel from '../components/Design/ProfileCarousel' import AboutCard from '../components/Design/AboutCard' import '../assets/css/home.css' const Home = () => { const fadeTop = useSpring({ config: {duration: 800}, from: {opacity: 0, marginTop: -80}, to: {opacity: 1, marginTop: 0}, }) const fadeInTop = useSpring({ config: {duration: 1000}, from: {opacity: 0, marginTop: -80}, to: {opacity: 1, marginTop: 0}, }) return(

Full Stack Web Developer with a background in business aiming to bridge user experience with client needs.

) } const styles ={ brand: { fontStyle: 'italic', color: 'white' }, screenContainer: { paddingTop: '4em', paddingBottom: '10em', }, logo: { height: '4em', size: '4em', margin: '1em' } } export default Home;
